elementSpec.desc: encloses a part of a dictionary entry in which other phrase-level dictionary elements are freely combined.
include una parte di una voce di dizionario in cui sono combinati liberamente altri elementi di dizionario a livello sintagmatico
engloba una parte de la entrada del diccionario en la que otros elementos de nivel sintagmático del diccionario se combinan de forma libre.
他の句レベルの辞書項目と結合する，辞書項目の一部を示す．

entry.dictScrap: biryani or biriani (%bIrI"A:nI) any of a variety of Indian dishes ... [from Urdu]

remarks.p: May contain any dictionary elements in any combination.
This element is used to mark part of a dictionary entry in which lower level dictionary elements appear, but which does not itself form an identifiable structural unit.
